snippet: Analysts widely agree that there is little chance that former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi will govern Italy again, but he is likely to win enough seats in Parliament to achieve his goals.
abstract: Memo from Rome; former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi has blitzed airwaves with theatrical blend of anti-establishment populism and has seen support for his People of Liberty party rise; analysts widely agree that there is little chance Berlusconi will govern country again, but he is likely to win enough seats in Parliament to achieve his goals.
lead_paragraph: Analysts widely agree that there is little chance that former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi will govern Italy again, but he is likely to win enough seats in Parliament to achieve his goals.

headline.seo: Berlusconi Stirs Up Elections in Italy
headline.main: An Insider’s Insider Returns to Politics, This Time as an Outsider
headline.print_headline: An Insider’s Insider Returns to Politics, This Time as an Outsider
